quotes.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.

Keep your thoughts positive, because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive, because your words become your behavior. Keep your behavior positive, because your behavior become your habits. Keep your habits positive, because your habits
Stay positive, all other choices are pointless punishments to your psyche.
If you are positive, you'll see opportunities instead of obstacles.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.

No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
You cannot change reality, but you can control the manner in which you look at things. Your attitude is under your own control. Weed out the negative and focus on the positive!
When it rains, it pours? but soon, the sun shines again. Stay positive. Better days are on their way.
The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
Stay positive in every situation and everything you do, never stop trying, have faith don't stop due to failure.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
Positive thinking is empowering, positive action is achieving.
An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
Negative people need drama like oxygen. Stay positive, it'll take their breath away.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
No matter what you face, don't forget if you're positive, positivity will find you and embrace you.

I try and stay positive; being negative isn't good for my personality. I don't just bring myself down, I bring everyone around me down. It's like a dark cloud, 'Uh oh, here we go,' and have to snap out of it.
Be positive with every idea surrounding your dreams. Think about the possibility of what you plan to do and approach it with an optimistic action. Stay positively.
I have the ability to build myself up or break myself down. I stay positive. Strength comes from within.
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
You will never succeed if you do not believe that you deserve what you want. Visualize your goal. Make an effort to go for it and always stay positive that it can be yours.
Positivity will block the negative thoughts that overwhelm you during tough times. Stay positive and you'll achieve more than what you set yourself for.
The positivity in our life is a function of our thinking. So think positive, stay positive!
Be fanatically positive and militantly optimistic. If something is not to your liking, change your liking.
